colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG 'DON THABS MANG MOD KYANG 'DIR KHYER BDE MDOR BSDUS TSUL DU BKOD, CUNG ZAD RGYAS PAR 'DOD NA, MTSAN BRJOD 'DON THABS 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SKU BAR MA'I GSUNG SOGS DANG, SDUD PA 'DON THABS YONGS 'DZIN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BRGYAD SNGONG PA 'DON THABS LTAR BYA'O, ,'DI NI 'JAM SDUD BZANG GSUM ZHAL 'DON BYED 'DOD 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL NGOR SNYOMS LAS PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS DAM PA'I GSUNG BZHIN 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
